For some people winter break means eating homecooked meals and celebrating the holidays with friends and friends PERIOD For others winter break is the best opportunity of the year to catch as many concerts as possible PERIOD

There are many concert choices for students that live in Philadelphia Pittsburgh and New York PERIOD For those students that dont two words road trip PERIOD

For anyone who needs a break from studying let the winter concert season start off here at Penn State PERIOD Aerosmith is playing at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at the Bryce Jordan Center PERIOD And luckily for the diehard Aerosmith fans theyre playing two days later at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at the First Union Center in Philadelphia PERIOD

 said Marc Pugliese freshmanengineering PERIOD 

For students from Pittsburgh there are few concerts over break and no live music on New Years Eve PERIOD Hatebreed will play at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at M PERIOD However for those who prefer the more mellow tones of JGB they will be playing at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at Rosebud PERIOD Perhaps a few lucky fans can catch both shows PERIOD

Pittsburgh hits a dry spell in live music until Jan PERIOD  when the Rolling Stones bring their act to the Mellon Arena at  p.m PERIOD

New York has more than its share of good concerts PERIOD The Dave Matthews Band will play at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  and  at Madison Square Garden PERIOD

New York is known for its legendary New Years Eve celebration however music may draw more people this year because of the many concerts and the twoyear wait for a Phish reunion PERIOD The reunion show will take place at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at Madison Square Garden PERIOD Tickets for that show sold out in less than ten minutes PERIOD

 said Dennis Dan Woody freshmanpsychology PERIOD 

New York is not the place to be if someone has trouble deciding which concerts to attend PERIOD

Karl Densons Tiny Universe will add its jazzfunk sounds to New York at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  and  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at the B.B PERIOD King Blues Club  Grill both nights PERIOD Govt Mule will play at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  and  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at The Beacon Theatre PERIOD Paul Oakenfold will perform at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at Exit Nightclub PERIOD

Philadelphia starts things off after Christmas with moe PERIOD playing at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  and  at the Tower Theatre in Upper Darby PERIOD Pat McGee Band will be playing at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  at The Electric Factory PERIOD Philadelphias own Disco Biscuits will bring their eccentric technojams to The Electric Factory at  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD   and  PERIOD

No matter where Penn State students live there is bound to be some kind of live music just a road trip away PERIOD
